summary: The diff implements all requested requirements for manual revision marking with persistent red/green status indicators. Backend adds reviewCount field to RevisionSchedule with migration, frontend adds mark-as-reviewed functionality across calendar, topics, and today views with visual indicators and review count displays.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for adding reviewCount field to RevisionSchedule
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints explicitly state 'Maintain compatibility with existing isReviewed field in RevisionSchedule' - no mention of adding new fields like reviewCount. The non-goals and requirements focus only on marking revisions as reviewed (isReviewed field), not tracking review counts.

hallucinated_features.description: Reschedule revision functionality in SubTopicScheduleView with handleReschedule function
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention rescheduling revisions. Requirements focus only on marking revisions as reviewed and displaying status indicators. Rescheduling is outside the scope of requested features.
